title: Aobelieve Baby Camera Crib Mount for Infant Optics DXR-8 and DXR-8 PRO Video Baby Monitor
features: Easily clip onto your baby's crib and adjust the camera's angle to get the best view of your baby.
The extended pole allows you to mount the baby camera up higher to get complete coverage of your baby.
The simple clamp design for easily installing and moving from room to room without drilling or tools.
Secure the power cable with included reusable cable ties.
The clamp can be adjusted from 0 to 1.7 inches to fit most cribs.
Soft non-slip silicone pads ensure a secure fit and protect your furniture from damage.
Works with Infant Optics DXR-8 and DXR-8 Pro baby monitors only.
What's in the box: 1x Crib mount base, 1x Extended pole, 1x Infant Optics baby camera adapter, 2x Power cable ties.
Please Note: Infant Optics baby monitors are not included.
description: Easily clip onto your baby's crib and adjust the camera's angle to get the best view of your baby. Works with Infant Optics DXR-8 and DXR-8 Pro baby monitors only.
